Almost Mathieu operator, dynamical localization
[2000]Primary 81Q10; Secondary 37D25, 47B36

We prove that the exponential moments of the position
operator stay bounded for the supercritical almost Mathieu operator
with Diophantine frequency.

positive Lyapunov exponents.
